summary: This bill, the Tax Relief from Tariffs and High Costs Act, proposes to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. It introduces a refundable credit for individuals, equal to 10% of their Federal income tax liability for the 2025 tax year. This credit is subject to a modified adjusted gross income limitation of $100,000 for single filers and $200,000 for joint filers. The bill also includes conforming amendments and specifies an effective date of taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
